channel.title: francine on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in francine on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Going to send Francine to Sydney
item.description: 19:05 Friday 11 March 2016 JST I bought a copy of Francois in case I ever lost him. But the copy wasn’t the same color, so the new rabbit became Francine, Francois’ girlfriend. Sydney decided she loved Francois and that he should be her rabbit, and I was like, “yeah nah” because I’ve had Francois longer than she’s been alive. But, I said I’d be happy to send Francine to her.
